title: Digital Micro-Credential Assessment and Delivery Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Device Usage Skills and Online Learning Experience
context.additional_context: Course focusing on digital micro-credential assessment systems and LMS (Learning Management System) integration technology to enhance expertise in the science field

learning_goals: Learners can design micro-credential evaluation processes using digital badge systems and learning management systems (LMS).
Learners can develop digital micro-credentials applicable to specific science-related tasks through project-based assessments.
Learners can analyze the potential use of AI-based assessment tools and propose integration strategies into existing evaluation systems.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
